Reach
{2}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ferocious Marksman. It deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. Activate only as a sorcery.
notes:
New card — Replaced Ember Beast

With the beast mana values and effects reshuffled a good deal, one of the devour beasts got put at 3MV, meaning we have a 3MV beast that works better for the set than Ember Beast, opening this slot for a red reach creature.
